    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AmbientLight
    AmbientLight class represents the ambient light in a scene.
    Camera
    Camera class represents a camera in 3D space.
    Camera.Builder
    Builder class for Camera It is used to create a camera with specific parameters.
    CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
     
    CameraTest
    Testing Camera Class
    Color
    Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
    Cylinder
    Cylinder class represents a cylinder in 3D space.
    CylinderTests
     
    Double3
    This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
    Geometries
    Geometries class represents a collection of intersectable geometries.
    GeometriesTest
     
    Geometry
    Abstract class representing a geometric shape in 3D space.
    ImageWriter
    Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
    ImageWriterTest
     
    Intersectable
    Intersectable interface represents a geometric object that can be intersected by a ray.
    Intersectable.Intersection
    Calculates the normal vector at a given point on the geometry.
    Main
    Test program for the 1st stage
    Plane
    Plane class represents a geometric plane in 3D space.
    PlaneTest
     
    Point
    Point class represents a point in 3D space.
    PointTests
     
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    PolygonTests
    Testing Polygons
    RadialGeometry
    Abstract class representing a radial geometry.
    Ray
    Ray class represents a ray in 3D space.
    RayTests
     
    RayTracerBase
    RayTracerBase class is an abstract base class for ray tracing algorithms.
    RayTracerType
    Ray tracer types
    RenderTests
    Test rendering a basic image
    Scene
    The Scene class represents a 3D scene with a name, background color, ambient light, and geometries.
    SimpleRayTracer
    SimpleRayTracer class is a basic implementation of a ray tracer.
    Sphere
    Sphere class represents a sphere in 3D space It extends the RadialGeometry class
    SphereTests
     
    Triangle
    Triangle class represents a triangle in 3D space.
    TriangleTests
     
    Tube
    Tube class represents a tube geometry in 3D space.
    TubeTests
     
    Util
    Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
    Vector
    Vector class represents a vector in 3D space.
    VectorTests
